New Records: Cleveland Cavaliers are 7-0, one win away from their best start in franchise history
Donovan Mitchell scored 30 points, including a game-winning jumper with three-tenths of a second left
Key Match Events: Donovan Mitchell's game-winning jumper after a near backcourt violation
Damian Lillard's 41 points and 10 three-pointers, his most since joining the Bucks
Post-Match Reflections: Milwaukee Bucks struggled without Khris Middleton and needed more contributions from Gary Trent Jr.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lillard's 10 three-pointers were his most since joining the Bucks
Teams will meet again in Cleveland
